title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: When creating a new file, the line delimiter used is currently determined by the value returned from System.getProperties("line.delimiter"). However, this default behavior does not always meet the user's requirements.
EB: The software should provide a user interface that allows users to define the default line delimiters for new files. This way, users can customize the line delimiter according to their specific needs.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Use a Unix and Windows workstation to develop a Unix product/program.
2. Create a new file in the software.
3. Observe that the line delimiter used for the new file is based on the System.getProperties("line.delimiter") value.
